name: Bloody Sand
description: You are an elite soldier of the special SWAT unit, the cases of breakthroughs have become tougher in the south of Syrii, your task is not to let the terrorists move on, clean small settlements and block the approaches at the borders.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.5 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 4670 (512 MB) / GeForce GT 430 (1024 MB) Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.5 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon R7 260X (2 GB) / GeForce GTX 550 Ti (1 GB) Storage: 800 MB available space
